to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess

Zhaoyuan county level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong

sentences.english: Zhaoyuan is billed as China's gold capital.
sentences.chinese: 招遠，有着“中國金都”之稱。

sentences.english: Finally, puts forward the suggestion on the improvements of Zhaoyuan City agricultural land use efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 最後，提出改進招遠市農用地利用效率的建議。
